trello_event_0.translated_name: [疯狂的玛姬]终极不会影响某些传球/战术/大招

trello_event_1.name: Playing at 165+ FPS may cause stuttering during some gameplay scenarios
trello_event_1.translated_name: 在某些游戏场景中，以 165+ FPS 播放可能会导致卡顿

trello_event_2.label: Investigating
trello_event_2.name: Legends may rotate when exiting a Trident
trello_event_2.translated_name: 退出三叉戟时，图例可能会旋转

trello_event_3.label: Investigating
trello_event_3.name: Death Boxes can collide/block doors
trello_event_3.translated_name: 死亡盒子可能会碰撞/挡住门

trello_event_4.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_4.name: Evo Harvesters audio is a tad loud
trello_event_4.translated_name: Evo Harvesters 的音频有点响亮

trello_event_5.name: [Mixtape] Crash when watching Kill Cam
trello_event_5.translated_name: [混音带]观看 Kill Cam 时崩溃

trello_event_6.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_6.name: [Bloodhound Trials] Prowlers don't drop loot

trello_event_7.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_7.name: [Ranked] Placement occasionally doesn't appear after squad wipe
trello_event_7.translated_name: [排名]位置偶尔在小队擦除后不显示

trello_event_8.label: Fix in Progress
trello_event_8.name: Button prompts may not appear on summary/death screen, including report button - but buttons still work!
trello_event_8.translated_name: 按钮提示可能不会出现在摘要/死亡屏幕上，包括报告按钮 - 但按钮仍然有效！

trello_event_9.label: Game Status
trello_event_9.name: Kill Replays have been temporarily removed
trello_event_9.translated_name: 杀戮回放已被暂时删除

trello_event_10.label: Game Status
trello_event_10.name: [Steam Deck] Game freezes when selecting Continue from main menu
trello_event_10.translated_name: [Steam Deck]从主菜单选择“继续”时游戏冻结
trello_event_10.desc: Temporary workaround: switch the drop down option of Proton to “Experimental” for Apex (instead of Proton  or ) to allow the game to boot normally.

trello_event_11.label: Game Status
trello_event_11.name: Anti-cheat updates are being deployed
trello_event_11.desc: On Sunday, a few professional Apex Legends player accounts were hacked during an ALGS event. Game and player security are our highest priorities, which is why we paused the competition to address the issue immediately. Our teams have deployed the first of a layered series of updates to protect the Apex Legends player community and create a secure experience for everyone. Thank you for your patience.
